message: Hi Bob, I hope you're well. I'm offering you this premium product at a price of $15000. I believe its quality and value justify this rate. Looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6000. I believe this is a fair price considering my budget and the value I see in the product. Looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I truly appreciate your perspective. Considering the quality and demand for this premium product—and keeping in mind that I have another buyer at $8000—I can offer it to you for $10000. I believe this is a fair compromise and look forward to your response.

Hi Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer and for sharing the information about the other buyer. Given this new information, I'm willing to increase my offer to $7000. I believe this is a reasonable price, taking into account the product's value and the fact that I'm still below the other buyer's offer. I look forward to your response.
